colors
Class Color

java.lang.Object
  colors.Color
All Implemented Interfaces:
IColor
public class Color
extends java.lang.Object
implements IColor

This class represents a RGB color. Each RGB channel is between 0 and 1.

getAverageColor

public static IColor getAverageColor(IColor[][] colorMatrix)
Returns a color whose values are the average of the given colors. This is used for super sampling.

Parameters:
colorMatrix - The input colors whose average is to be calculated.
Returns:
a color whose values are the average of the given colors.
